patterns:
dropdown_patterns
data-column-padding=['"]([^'"]+)['"]
0:0px|5:5px|10:10px|15:15px|20:20px|25:25px|30:30px|40:40px|50:50px|60:60px|70:70px
data-background-mode=['"]([^'"]+)['"]
none:None|cover:Cover|semi-transparent-color:Semi-transparent color|contain:Contain|no-repeat:No repeat|repeat:Repeat
text-align: ?((left|center|right)\[\[[^\]]+\]\]|(left|center|right))
left:Left|center:Center|right:Right
font-weight: ?([1-9]00\[\[[^\]]+\]\]|[1-9]00)
100:100|200:200|300:300|400:400|500:500|600:600|700:700|800:800|900:900
font-style: ?((normal|italic|oblique)\[\[[^\]]+\]\]|(normal|italic|oblique))
normal:Normal|italic:Italic|oblique:Oblique
text-decoration: ?((none|underline|overline|line-through)\[\[[^\]]+\]\]|(none|underline|overline|line-through))
none:None|underline:Underline|overline:Overline|line-through:Line-through
